LanguageData.CategoryToggle.settings.0.label: Animal surgery categories
LanguageData.CategoryToggle.settings.0.tooltip:
Normally, animals are broken into "categories" based on gameplay usefulness and common sense, which determine which kinds of prosthetics can and can't be installed into them. Specifically:
Category 1 - medieval prostheses Rodents and other tiny animals for which I think installing even simple prosthetics would be silly.
Category 2 - simple prostheses Livestock and other animals which can't be trained or can't carry extra mass in caravans (except for the house cat).
Category 3 - bionic prostheses Pack animals and trainable pets (and the house cat).
Disabling this will allow all animal surgeries to be performed on all animals. REQUIRES RESTART
